name: VAULT OF HONOR
description: The death of the king has left the land in chaos.  With no heirs to assume his throne, anarchy among those who would seek to rule has ensued.  To end the disputes and find a suitable replacement, the people have decreed any man who can retrieve the royal crown from the depths of the vault of honor will earn the right to lead.  The dungeon presents you with challenges of foul creatures, deadly traps, and the mysterious maze below.  The kingdoms seer will also use his wisdom to test your character and ability to rule.  Gather yourself and journey into the depths.  Prove your worth to the people and secure your place on the throne.
